StarCross.Tooltip: The darkness has already permeated the starry sky,can the stained Southern Cross still guide the way?

TrueS.Tooltip: Seeds bear new life when flowers dare to fade......

Tomato.Tooltip: why it is not a potato?

The pages of this paper book are engraved with blood and broken bones.
It is evident that producing this book would come at a great cost.
The malice you emit is all aimed at your own sharp teehyp

SCS.Tooltip: It will make all damage.None will run away from the death.

Hypocricy.Tooltip:
Someone once destroyed the city of Saint Denis under the banner of counterattack.
But after the fall of Saint Denis, no one could find the precious plants that originally existed in its laboratory.
The chess game between people has always been like this, 
Only those who are unrelated to it and those who cannot influence the game care about benevolence and righteousness.
Is this really what you want?

Justice.Tooltip:
There are many discussions about the federal government like river sands.
Some people say that it has made great contributions to the survival and development of human civilization.
Some people also say that it has created countless tragedies that should not have existed.
However, the federation still operates in its own way,
Even if it is only like a decaying tower, even if it is constantly collapsing with mud and sand.
However, the balance is already unbalanced

HMBag2.Tooltip: Throw to Shimmer to open it

The remaining soul of the Blood God mixed into its blood and turned into dust.
Perhaps you can use it to create items with a Blood God theme.
But why does the ache only get worse?

PaperSword.Tooltip: Like something we do in class

DonQuixote.Tooltip: Successful or not,I am who I am;Iam my biggest enermy and friend...

EOM.Tooltip: Summon the Divinity of Despair. You will never regret it again.

Mixue.Tooltip: A strange ice cream,it may belong to a big snow man...

Venus.Tooltip: This sword is enough to bury the night.The power comes from the pursuit of endness beauty.

OpticalLimit.Tooltip: This bow is alerady to pierce throw the sky.It will annihilate everything that obstrucys you.

NeonLimit.Tooltip: This staff points to the starting of light.Endness stars born from this place.

RealismMetal.Tooltip: They look like a kind of metal,but Forandera repeatedly emphasized that it is unreal.

HollowDevourer.Tooltip: It will launch projectiles purely designed to penetrate the soul, and no object can stop it.

Dismemberment.Tooltip: This sword does not require any decoration, it only comes from the concept of "dismember".

MetalBass.Tooltip: C a t s L o v e F i s h

NamelessEpic.Tooltip: The next day,the light tear the dark.

EpicFragments.Tooltip:
The old city-state, along with its dream of revival, has been destroyed.
Blood flowed like a river. The blood branches, swollen from congestion, grew wildly upwards, obscuring the entire sky.
Why stand up? I have asked myself too many times.
However, there is not much time to reminisce.
I only remember the last moment, when a shower of blood poured down.
With the pride of memories flowing away.
...
"After you set sail, there was a rainstorm"
"It scattered the blood and the sea"
"I witnessed it firsthand, causing memories to fade away"
"In a daze, I saw the old figure return. "
——The Lamplighter

CondenseSword.Tooltip: Buy now! With not hot pieces......

KOE.Tooltip: Hear and hear all the voices trapped in thee......

KOR.Tooltip: May all the beauty be blessed......

Lampwick.Tooltip: Maybe you just take a bag

Notthebees.Tooltip: Ohhh the jungle emperor will angry

SpiritsTotem.Tooltip: +5 def,+2 summon column and 15% summon damage

AnchorofRealism.Tooltip: The direction of fate, determined not to forget.

GSG.Tooltip: The lighthouse is eternal, with brightly spark shines.

LunarIris.Tooltip: A sealed knife, it will become stronger and stronger as you grow

LunarIris2.Tooltip: A good knife, it is said to be a gift from someone to their close friend

LunarIris3.Tooltip: A blood grinking knife, the power of the Blood God's remains is awakening it

LunarIris4.Tooltip: A shining knife, it is said that its owner once used it to slay fallen evil gods

LunarIris5.Tooltip: Today, I suddenly understand that you are right beside me

BloodgoldBar.Tooltip:
A substance mixed with blood and soul, resembling metal in appearance
You seem to have heard an extremely subtle lament.

Cakelie.Tooltip:
+1 life regen
"Cake is not a lie.Trust me."

ATE.Tooltip:
When your life is endangered, significantly increase life regeneration
-15% generic attack
"It's real name is Anti-masochist Equation."

HealthBT.Tooltip: -100 hp, get a big damage buff one time

LegenderyF.Tooltip:
Smile, my proud child,
The sinking land blooms with flowers of hope;
I will remember, my proud child,
Your vow to expel suffering and pain;
Have a beautiful dream, my proud child,
Your answer is exactly yourself.
...
＂What is the far side of the moon?＂
＂The back of the moon？＂
＂No, not just the back of the moon, but also the entire starry sky behind it＂
——A conversation at some point
LegenderyF.DisplayName: Epic Fragments - Divinity of Despair, Forandera

BookofRelife.Tooltip:
This book is exquisite and elegant, and its content seems to be an adventure novel.
At the end of the story, the protagonist destroys the conspiracy and becomes a hero.
Even if all the text above is fake.
This is a process of ordinary people moving towards greatness.

Enderwish.Tooltip:
Not occupying summon and pet storage space
 Summon Forandera to fight with you
 The radiance of hope purifies everything
 Add 20% generic damage

BloodgodShackle.Tooltip:
50 damage
It might better than EoC Shield?

Readme.Tooltip:
Here we go?
This journey is different.
The girl with silver white long hair is watching you
Let's witness together, the answer she is seeking
As the size of the settlement expands,hardworking community members will soon visit
Your journey will have more fun
If you have enough townspeople, the Grand Archor will notice you
May you prove your courage to him
Not long after, a mysterious guy will also arrive
What is she going to do? Perhaps just watching from the side? No one knows.
A distorted plague has erupted in the space layer, be careful not to contraact deadly diseases
You can also bravely create eings and follow in the footsteps of your predecessors
Pick up familiar materials to build new weapons, defeat the walls of hell's flesh and blood, and explore just begun
Whent the wall of flesh and blood collapsed with a loud bang, and the souls bound in the world were liberated.
The townspeople are starting to sell more items, which is enough to deal with the new threat.
If you have the power to protect yourself, use the blood dust sold by Forandera and a crystal fragment to synthesize a stone quartz flower, and take revenge on the fallen blood god
Pay attention to collecting weapons and materials obtained during your journey, as they will be used to synthesize even more powerful items in the future
Follow the path you are familiar with and defeat the conspiracy on the far side of the moon.
A trial, an answer, pick up the short sword at the Forandera's place and release the secret behind her.
The bright light began to dim, but everything was not over.
Waving the sickle symbolizing light and darkness, picking up the lamp of infinite light, to tear apart all darkness.

LeAMHS.Tooltip:
The spore left its obituary to the world
Running towards the sky, the beast has already died
It will turn into rust rain, eroding the wounds of the earth
Corroded skill, corroded steel, corroded soul
What is more intense than ancient tides
Enough to dissolve all the lines
...
"Absurd as it is, it is the tip of the iceberg of what I once saw.
And what I see today, you are enough to tear apart filth into falling clouds.
Continue to prove your courage and ignite it into an explosive new star. ”
——The Archor

ENSD.Tooltip:
+15 Melee and Ranged final damage
-50% Magic Damage
-25% Summon Damage

GreenSpar.Tooltip:
Increases summon damage by 5% for every 100 max mana
-20% Mana Cost
-50% Melee Damage
-25% Ranged Damage

ForanderaQuartz.Tooltip:
Increase maximum health by 100
Provide additional effects based on different current lives
When the health is greater than 25%, increase damage by 10% and critical strike by 10%
When the life is less than 25%, increase 20 defenses and 5 life regenerations

SilvermoonKnight.Tooltip:
A wide bladed giant gun that once belonged to a witty guardian.
The will of a person shines brighter than the reflection of metal.

TwilightWitch.Tooltip:
A staff, with colorful projectiles
different colors have different effects

Midnight.Tooltip: A collection of fables about the starry sky

LegenderyD.Tooltip:
Without wings, we do not belong to the sky
So we picked up the wax and created wings
And then proudly soar in the sky
"We will eventually die "we said
"Our story will be remembered by someone "we said
Until the scorching sun melted away the dreams
We fell into the sea and died
...
"I have heard of the deeds of the heroes of peregrine falcons.
Guardian of the sky, I will pray that the filth on your bodies may fade away, and that your souls may return to the earth"
——The Star Facilitator, Forandera

"The scepter from the burial god. It seems that you have gained her trust"

A4.Tooltip: Rive enemy just like rive paper

Redruin3.Tooltip: Add health when hit enemys by blade

Increase defense and endurance when heath is full.
Reduce damage from debuffs.
Increase defense when you have Mental Trauma/Blood Collapse/Mutation/Gene Breakdown buff.
Provide additional effects based on different current lives.
When the health is greater than 25%, increase damage by 10% and critical strike by 10%.

TremorCore.Tooltip: +18% damage. When the life is below 50%, the effect doubles

StormShackles.Tooltip: Add move speed and max flying time. When the life is below 50%, the effect double

ScaleShield.Tooltip: +12 defense and 5% endurance. When the life is below 50%, the effect double

RealismCatalyst.Tooltip: Used to catalyze the Realism Metal or make weapons.

LeMeg.Tooltip:
Trembling towards the abyss is a biological instinct
Now use reason. We will suppress fear.
I heard it, it declared the end of all things.
But who can profane the meaning of existence?
Who is qualified to use death to shatter reality?
Prove it, under the curse of lunar rock refraction
Those who destroy everything will eventually be destroyed by destruction.
...
"The titan that devours the core of terra, it is no less powerful than a divine creation.
However, it is ultimately just an unintentional beast, not worthy of sympathy or belief"
——The Lamplighter

KCS.Tooltip: Summon friendly KC Army to help you.

Note.Tooltip:
Are those equation gadgets fun? 
If you haven't even tried it once now, I would be very sad then.
To make fun of. I want you to do me a favor, which is to collect some 'epics'. Just recording something ... a simple story.
It may cost a lot of effort, but for both you and me, it's definitely worth it.
I believe you can do it. I will always wait for you.

WeightofExistence.Tooltip:
Increase 25% damage and 10% crit
but decrease 100% endurance and 2 life regen.

BronyaLegs.Tooltip:
19 Defense
+18% move speed
Increase max move speed
+20% Collapse Buff endurance

16 Defense
+15% Damage
+5% Crit
+20% Collapse Buff endurance

BronyaBody.Tooltip:
25 Defense
+10% endurance
+4 life regen
+20% Collapse Buff endurance

ZirconiumBar.Tooltip: Its function has not been fully developed

LeJworm.Tooltip:
In the corners of the old miasma, time weaves into cocoons
And then it was born from the bottom
Hurry up, even faster, said the slaughter
Quickly build the forgotten into scales
Quickly turn the desecrated into a feast
Only dignity has not been picked up again
When the rock of vanity shatters, you will see
Those millions of eyes are staring at you
Like staring at another piece of garbage that should have been buried
......
"Being born like morning dew is not the fault of fate.
But the result is like this... perhaps, this is the original sin."
——The Star Facilitator, Forandera

StaroverLegs.Tooltip:
7 defence
Increase 8% move speed and 3% crit

StaroverSummon.Tooltip: Increase 12% summon damage and 1 ma minion

LeWM.Tooltip:
The Forgotten, don't raise your eyes, the earth lies barren before you.
The Forsaken, don't raise your eyes, this land claims you no more.
The Condemned, don't raise your eyes, the earth holds not your glory.
O' Bearer of the Greatest Name—
Before all, all, all ends,
Cast your eyes to sky one last time
Hold true to your oath, until Time itself crumbles to dust.
......
"A lonely machine buried underground for hundreds of years? Terrifying meow! 
But... there will be a day when even we will be forgotten meow?"
--The Community Committee Member

StarofBethlehem.Tooltip: Magic weapon attacks will have additional effects of burning, poisoning, and electrification

ForgottenShackled.Tooltip:
3 defence
No fallen damage
Add 30 max flying time

StarHeatDeath.Tooltip: Next time you pull the trigger, you shouldn't hesitate anymore

USB.Tooltip:
Repair your body and significantly increase all attributes
But you will continue to burn until death
"Did you see? The moment the feather burns"
"The flying bird has already embraced the sun"

DS.Tooltip:
When you take damage, your Mana will absorb 50% of it.
Any excess damage beyond your Mana will deduct from your HP normally.
Your Mana Regeneration is forcibly set to zero.
When your Mana is below 50% of your maximum Mana, you take 25% more damage.
When your Mana is below 25% of your maximum Mana, you deal 25% less damage.
"Honestly, this shouldn’t be used together with unlimited Mana."
"That's all I have to say—the choice is yours."

ExperimentalSteamGun.Tooltip:
Use gel as ammunication
Eliminating pests with exceptional efficiency！

BloodWildHunting.Tooltip:
Increase 10% Melee Crit
Increase 15% Melee Attack Speed
Decrease 20% Melee Damage
"Kill.Forget.Kill.Forget."

EndewoteBadge.Tooltip:
Increase 10 defense,10% damage,5% crit and 10% attack speed
Double the effect in FTW seeds
For the worthy......
......
Take this badge as a memento of an age of heroes.
Only the most worthy shall be bestowed with this supreme honor.
Those who have lost everything will carry it as the embodiment of their family name.

ThePactofForever.Tooltip:
Summon the Star Facilitator to your location immediately.
Revive the Star Facilitator if the ally is unable to fight.
You may use it anytime before the fated moment arrives...
But using it will shatter it.
...
An exquisite crystal feather hairpin, embodying an initial promise...
"I foresee you will become everyone’s hero."
"If only I could be by your side at that moment..."

HPPart.Tooltip: Can use to make some cool weapons

LeGhost.Tooltip:
From ashes I arise, by hands unyielding
Flee the Sea of Death, mimicking the form in memory...
Too much remembered. Too much forgotten.
Too much clung to. Too much lost.
Is pure whiteness reality or wishful thinking?
The vast stellar orbits have branded my soul—
Only fate cannot be defied.
Even if...
Its absurd jest never ceases!
Never! Never! Never!
......
"Don't have to bear too much for me...Forandera."
——The Lamplighter

AzurePhantom.Tooltip:
Upon swinging, it unleashes wide-ranging blade auras.
Sword energy slashes auto-locks onto enemies and detonates on impact.
A ritual sword of Forandera. Wielded only during her tenure as Holy Maiden.
No one dares to question the weight it bears—
"Redemption."

OrangeJuice.Tooltip:
The classic sweet and sour fruit juice, Forandera's favorite.
Slightly increases Movement Speed (+8% Movement Speed) for 3 minutes.
"Not all oranges are created equal, baby."

LightFruitTea.Tooltip:
A blend of fruit juice and tea with a unique flavor.
Slightly increases Critical Strike Chance (+5% Critical Strike Chance) for 3 minutes.
"Neither too sweet nor too rich—perfect for any time."

PearlMilkTea.Tooltip:
A popular, extra-sweet beverage.
Slightly increases Damage and Defense (+3% Damage, +2 Defense) for 3 minutes.
"Watch out—you might not sleep at night."

CPAP.Tooltip:
In multiplayer mode, resurrect all dead players immediately.
	Grant the "Resurrection Cooldown" effect for 10 minutes.
	This item cannot be reused during the duration of "Resurrection Cooldown".
	No use in single player
	Note: Player texture might in piece. Die again will fix it.

TownNPCMood.Content: Hello!If you need anything,please go here.
TownNPCMood.NoHome: No home for me now.Have you got a room for me?I will pat for it...maybe.
TownNPCMood.FarFromHome: I think I got a lost.
TownNPCMood.DislikeCrowded: Maybe these guys did not like this place.So crowded.

TownNPCMood.HateCrowded: We are like fish in a jar.
TownNPCMood.LoveSpace: This place is good.I am glad to be buried into the land.
TownNPCMood.FarFromHome: Too long to back,no light,no road.
TownNPCMood.NoHome: Some one just like me is strolling.

TownNPCMood.LoveSpace: 我非常喜欢有这么大的空间。
Big place for me to play VR!
TownNPCMood.FarFromHome: A long long way from my home.

ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue1: I heard the echoes of terra. The world is still filled with suffering, but we will solve it.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue2: What's the color of your heart?
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue3: Blood magic is out of the ordinary,but that is only a mirror,a mirror of the cruel world.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue4: Get lots of money from me? I have no comment.Just be happy.Really...
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue5: Even if you endure hardships, don't stop. Keep moving forward, you can do it!
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue6: My past? That's a secret. My current task is to assist you.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue7: Even though fate is so cruel, those small animals are still surviving. Every life has meaning.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue8: What is meant by 'the only one you can trust is me?'
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue9: Why am I not affected by Blood Moon? Uh......You can try to let Blood Moon be influenced by you.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue10: The world is even more beautiful because of you......At least I would think so.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue11: You know what? Even super large ships cannot do without the simplest steel plates. So we need to start with the best steel plate.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue12: I want to learn divination and then......Stop, I'm just getting a glimpse of the door, not that impressive.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue13: If possible, I would like to study theology. But Rina told me that I don't actually need to do that.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue14: Oh, are you here? Can I help you?
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue15: The belief of jungle lizards can give the stone statue such powerful power How much connection does faith and divinity have?
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue16: Although it doesn't seem like the question I raised, I still want to ask: How would you like to live?
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue17: Miss community committee member? She is good to all of us. Her ears are soft!
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue18: Spring is the season of growth for all things and the season of hope. The blooming flowers on the grassland are also a memorable scenery.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue19: Although......Well, this scene is indeed a bit scary. I mean it.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue20: I want to hear the voice of God .You want to become a god? Haha, it's not necessarily true.
ForanderaNPC.StandardDialogue21: Oh, my goodness ,Why are you here? I'll protect you......try my best.

RinaNPC.StandardDialogue2: Forandera have her own secrets.I respect her choise.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue3: My weapons come from myself.If you want,you can take them.But the cost...you know that.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue4: I am a great wizard,Do you belive it? So,actually I am a god,would you believe it again?
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue5: You need to go further, further. Until I can't even see it.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue6: Try riding a plastic pony, holding a cardboard sword, and charging towards a windmill!
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue7: What is meant by 'the one looks orange'? The barrage I fired was clearly blue!
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue8: Where is your door? I can't knock. I can't do everything.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue9: When it's extremely dark, I will light a lamp for you.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue10: Perhaps there is still knowledge in this world that brings me joy but has not been discovered by me.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue11: Do you know the theory of the subconscious? Forandra used it to create a powerful metal. Perhaps one day she will let you use it.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue12: Having that guy around will make me much more relaxed. But that doesn't mean I'm willing to look up at him.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue13: 99% of the enemies here are not a threat. Uh, I'm not your bodyguard.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue14: Who has eyes on their brain? Oh my god,Your story ruined this beautiful day.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue15: I once had a friend......Before she said goodbye to me, she returned the gift I had given her. I will never forget her.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue16: Revive? Blasphemy. But looking back, I haven't done much either. If one day I am punished by heaven, stay away from me.No, you can't run either.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue17: That little cat who likes coins? Well, ivery fun. I gave her a little favor.Keep it confidential, don't say it was me who did it!
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue18: Bathing in the warm sunset, lying down peacefully in the maple forest, watching the fruits ripen, is truly a great happiness.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue19: Want to see how I made a fool of myself under the Blood Moon? Thinking beautifully. The moon is not worthy of competing with the sun.
RinaNPC.StandardDialogue20: The Sun？Perhaps the sun has already died.

Archon.StandardDialogue1: The real face? That's not good for you.
Archon.StandardDialogue2: Many of my products come from citizens, except for the one that looks orange.
Archon.StandardDialogue3: Want to challenge me? If you can prove yourself, I don't mind having a competition with you.
Archon.StandardDialogue4: Never give up.Never be a yielder.Never fall into depravity.
Archon.StandardDialogue5: Sharing an observation: I had to share some serious parts.
Archon.StandardDialogue6: There's no need to fuss over the future. Have you finished what you should be doing now?
Archon.StandardDialogue7: I just need to stand here, and others will understand what I mean. I didn't actually move at all.
Archon.StandardDialogue8: The theory of the lamplighter differs from mine, but sometimes we still need to collaborate.
Archon.StandardDialogue9: Next time you come in, knock on the door first. If there is no door, knock on the platform.
Archon.StandardDialogue10: Share a story: There was a king of the jungle who loved bees. Be careful when you go to the jungle to deal with bees.
Archon.StandardDialogue11: Terra Emperor? I am not the Terra Emperor.
Archon.StandardDialogue12: Neither I nor that guy will be responsible for things that shouldn't exist. Be prepared before facing the test.
Archon.StandardDialogue13: Share an observation: the core strength of humans is stronger than that of worms. As long as you run fast enough, worms won't be able to catch up with you.
Archon.StandardDialogue14: Are you buying my product because you don't have silk to make an automatic fishing machine?
Archon.StandardDialogue15: A person's strength may not necessarily be efficient, and the power of unity will also be comparable to that of gods. That's why the term 'Archon' was formed.
Archon.StandardDialogue16: My clothes? You can get one from anywhere. But what really matters is that strong enough heart.
Archon.StandardDialogue17: The community committee member takes her work very seriously. Although she has some language "characteristics", I am certain of her work.
Archon.StandardDialogue18: I once strolled in the snowy plains on winter nights. Respectful, calm, without a trace of dirt. Only in this way can we temporarily forget those things that we have to remember.
Archon.StandardDialogue19: Applying for additional military supplies requires presenting results first.
Archon.StandardDialogue20: There is not only one enemy in the world, nor is there only one friend. In this battlefield where numerous forces are intertwined and tearing apart, the true winner has not yet been determined.
Archon.StandardDialogue21: How did my army survive in such a difficult environment? Beliefs, strategies, and I called for a courier.
Archon.StandardDialogue22: Rare celestial phenomena. Those monsters? Speak to the truth.

KCNPC.StandardDialogue1: Stop, regular security check....... Okay, you can go now.
KCNPC.StandardDialogue2: In principle, I should not provide services to you, but the military and civilians are one family ,do you understand?
KCNPC.StandardDialogue3: The Grand Archon? If you see him, please give him my regards.
KCNPC.StandardDialogue4: This is the King Cobra Field Army. On the orders of the Grand Archon, we will protect your safety.
KCNPC.StandardDialogue5: Discovered by passersby? It seems that my covert techniques still need training.

ComNPC.StandardDialogue1: Morning meow! Want to see the construction of community members meow?
ComNPC.StandardDialogue3: You say Forandera meow? Cute meow!
ComNPC.StandardDialogue4: The the the aaarchon? Why he is here meow? I am afraid......
ComNPC.StandardDialogue5: Rina meow! She teased me meow! She also looks like a cat meow!
ComNPC.StandardDialogue6: The creaking sound of opening and closing doors is terrifying! What? What is "fixed fate" meow?
ComNPC.StandardDialogue7: Now we can help others handle the goods! so happy meow!
ComNPC.StandardDialogue8: I heard that in another Terra, there was a meow like me that was shattered into dust and raised... It's so scary meow! I definitely don't want to live in this world in the form of dust in the future, meow!
ComNPC.StandardDialogue9: Subscribe Forandera mod meow! Subscribe Forandera mod thanks meow!
ComNPC.StandardDialogue10: Do you like shiny things, meow? That's right, coins! Hand it over, meow!
ComNPC.StandardDialogue11: Do you want to join the Forandera community meow? Let's work together for a better tomorrow, Meow!
ComNPC.StandardDialogue12: Nothing is more important than a cup of iced cola in the midst of summer! Just combing through the fur can be troublesome, meow .....
ComNPC.StandardDialogue14: Re.GT，iCloudy ,子神木,翘盒, Kevi ,斯塔夫里STF,桐坂,Disaster_Horror,ChatLiu,Huangmo86,叶阳淮云醉巧，幻梦，You did a god job！

TextBboss1: Crazy blood began to boil ......A new offensive has begun!
TextBboss2: The blessed blood has been resurrected!
TextBboss3: The cursed blood has been resurrected!
TextFboss1: Radiance blooms from the cocoon shell......
TextFboss3: The Star Facilitator's divinity effected the Divinity of Despair.Boss autocatically deducts health points!
BloodgoldBonus: Increase 10% damage,20 maxhp and 1 life regen
BronyaBonus: Increase 100 life max, Increase 2s max flying time and 1 max mimion
StaroverBonus: Increase 5% damage and crit of your metier,you will move very fast
StaroverBonus2: Increase 1 max minion,you will move very fast
TextLamp1: About to Unleash: Hear the Call of the Apocalypse
TextLamp2: About to Unleash: Bid Farewell to the Light of the Past
TextLamp3: About to Unleash: Survivors Drown in the Dead Sea
TextLamp4: About to Unleash: Grant Sleep to the Lost
Texttalk0: It's really not easy to come here, traveler.
Texttalk1: You have come such a long way... you have not disappointed their expectations.
Texttalk2: But this is not the end. Far from it.
Texttalk3: If you cannot pass my test, then you cannot face the next enemy either.
Texttalk5: Don't easily fall with the sun!
Texttalk6: Time never stops, just like your journey. I believe you are prepared to face even more terrifying things.
Texttalk7: The real River Styx is much longer than this......
Texttalk8: Excellent! There are very few people who can force me to do this, you can be considered one.
Texttalk9: So, in this proof, seize your opportunity！
Texttalk10: The explosion of a supernova will never end until its heroic death......
Texttalk11: Go beyond me and become a true god, traveler!
Texttalk12: Are you using invincibility or what? This is no fun anymore, y'know......
Texttalk13: I'll admit you're tough enough to hang in there, but it's over now. I'm tired.
Texttalk14: Even if you beat me now, I still refuse to be your wife.
TextFboss11: Newborn children, even before they learn to walk or speak, will perceive what kind of world this is on their own.
TextFboss12: From the moment I was born, I could feel the earth's sorrows. This is a secret I never shared with them.
TextFboss13: Back then, I asked the world: Why must we endure all this suffering?
TextFboss14: But now, I understand how to live up to this innate gift.
TextFboss15: I will purify them, even if their obsessions run deeper than I can bear. I will keep searching for ways, until...
TextFboss16: Until I dedicate my life to this world—let the polluted be purified, the confined be freed, and the fallen be redeemed.
TextFboss17: Thank you, Traveler. At the moment I touched the answer, you stood firmly by my side.
TextFboss18: I, Forandera, swear by my name: this will not be a story of despair. It will be the beginning of [Rebirth].
TPOF2: The Star Facilitator Forandera has been revived!
TexttalkCPAP: The CPAP is useless in single player.Just sell at a good price.

DeathSeaBuff.Description: Do not forget that you will eventually die

StunBuff.Description: Decrease the knockback endurence of NPC,decrease the speed of player

BloodSumBuff.Description: A blood beetle will protext you

FoodBuff4.Description: Above 50% HP: Increases Defense, slightly reduces Life Regeneration,Below 50% HP: Increases Life Regeneration, slightly reduces Defense
